abstract: Investors want Citigroup's new leader to speed up the bank's overhaul. | Bank of America manages a slim third-quarter profit. | Two senators are raising concerns about bank capital rules. | Two pioneers of the high-speed trading industry are shutting down their firm.

headline.main: The Pressure Is On at Citigroup
